product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, fabrication, installation, welding, radiography, PAUT, UT, DPT , heat treatment, inspection and testing as required for the following nozzles (reinforcing pads covered under plate work) pipe, nozzle flanges and blind / companion/matching flanges (including davit/ hinge assembly for Man way) wherever shown on drawings and standards along with gaskets and boltings including supply of mandatory spares, conducting air pressure test for reinforcing pads, preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed by Owner/EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour to complete the work as per drawings, specifications , standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer-in- Charge. All internal bolting shall be SS 304 as a minimum and contractor shall include the same in his scope of supply and shall be included in nozzle assembly quoted price. Spare gaskets (2 nos.) and 10% spare bolting (minimum 2 nos.) shall be included in Contractor's scope of supply and shall be included in nozzle assembly quoted price. Shell   Nozzle   300   Class   WNRF   Type   24 Inch  Size   SA 105   Material
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: supply, fabrication, installation, welding, radiography, paut(phase array ultrasonic testing), ut(ultrasonic testing), dpt(dye penetrant testing), heat treatment, inspection, testing, pipe, nozzle flanges, blind/companion/matching flanges, davit/hinge assembly for man way, gaskets, boltings, mandatory spares, air pressure test for reinforcing pads, preparation of drawings, review by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, all internal bolting: ss 304(stainless steel 304) minimum, spare gaskets: 2 nos., 10% spare bolting (minimum 2 nos.), shell nozzle: 300 class, wnrf(weld neck raised face) type, material: sa 105

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, fabrication, erection, inspection and testing of steel structure for cone roof/ dome roof tank including curb angle, spiral stairway, cage ladder, handrail, top and intermediate platform, grating for stairway steps and platform, rolling ladder including track for floating roof, anchor chairs,  name plates, earthing connections, ladder rungs for ladders in covered roof tanks, wind girder fabricated from rolled section, wind girder bracings/ support, external structural supports, supports for shell extension for foam nozzles in case of floating roof tanks, stiffeners for shell extension plate of stairway, ventilation slots and over flow slots for covered floating roof tank including SS wire mesh, support for drip rings (Sketch No.: B568-000-80-42-SK-0002), preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed/ approved by owner/ EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/ machinery, tools and tackles required to complete the work as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials to be supplied by Contractor. Material: IS 2062
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: cone roof/dome roof tank, includes: curb angle, spiral stairway, cage ladder, handrail, top and intermediate platform, grating for stairway steps and platform, rolling ladder with track for floating roof, anchor chairs, name plates, earthing connections, ladder rungs for ladders in covered roof tanks, wind girder fabricated from rolled section, wind girder bracings/support, external structural supports, supports for shell extension for foam nozzles in case of floating roof tanks, stiffeners for shell extension plate of stairway, ventilation slots and overflow slots for covered floating roof tank, ss(stainless steel) wire mesh, support for drip rings, preparation of drawings, review/approval by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/machinery, tools and tackles, all materials to be supplied by contractor, material: is 2062(indian standard 2062)

product_entries.full_product_description: Design, Supply, fabrication, erection, inspection and testing of steel structure for cone roof/ dome roof supporting structure, preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed/ approved by owner/ EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/ machinery, tools and tackles required to complete the work as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials to be supplied by Contractor. Roof Structure Designed by Contractor Material: IS 2062
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: cone roof/dome roof supporting structure, includes: preparation of drawings, review/approval by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/machinery, tools and tackles, all materials to be supplied by contractor, roof structure designed by contractor, material: is 2062(indian standard 2062)

product_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF JET MIXER ASSEMBLY Contractor to supply and install the jet mixer assembly (RF pad, nozzle neck, internal flanges, bolts, nuts gaskets etc. and any other components required to conduct testing of jet mixer to be included in scope of supply) as per the tank jet mixer Process Data Sheet & Mechanical Data Sheet. Contractor scope includes the complete Residual Engineering of Jet Mixers including detailing of nozzle etc. in accordance to Process Data Sheets and relevant notes of Mechanical Data Sheet. All necessary Drawing / Design Calculations shall be provided furnished and provided by Contractor for EIL review. (PDS No.: B568-304-79-41-DS-1901 & B568-304-79-DS-1901; MOC: SS 304L / SS 316L). Nozzle Size - 10 Inch
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: rf pad, nozzle neck, internal flanges, bolts, nuts, gaskets, any other components required for testing, as per tank jet mixer process data sheet & mechanical data sheet, residual engineering of jet mixers, detailing of nozzle as per process data sheets and mechanical data sheet, drawing/design calculations for eil review, pds no.: b568-304-79-41-ds-1901 & b568-304-79-ds-1901, material of construction: ss 304l(stainless steel 304l)/ss 316l(stainless steel 316l)

product_entries.full_product_description: Dismantling of Existing tanks: Disconnecting of all the piping connections including cleaning, instruments, ladder, staircase, platforms, insulation and the all other attachments in the existing tanks. Dismantling of existing tanks, Preparation of dismantling schemes & the same to be approved by client /EIL, getting the necessary tools, tackles, machinery, equipment, cranes, providing Scaffolding etc to dismantle the tanks in sequential planned manner following all terms and conditions to suit the site conditions and the same shall be transported to dump yard as per Instructions of Engineer In-Charge. The following tank to be dismantled Item no: 304-T-16 Cone Roof Type For more details, refer existing AS BUILT drawing attached elsewhere in the tender.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: disconnecting piping connections, cleaning, instruments, ladder, staircase, platforms, insulation, all other attachments, dismantling of existing tanks, preparation of dismantling schemes, approval by client/eil, tools, tackles, machinery, equipment, cranes, scaffolding, sequential dismantling, transportation to dump yard, as per instructions of engineer in-charge, tank to be dismantled: item no: 304-t-16 cone roof type, reference: as built drawing

STILL WELLS/ DIP PIPES : Supply, fabrication, erection, inspection and testing of  still well for gauge hatch, still well for level transmitter/ level switches, still well for temperature element including flanges on all still wells, dip pipes (process / instrumentation), pipe fittings, drilling of holes in still well/ dip pipes, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour to complete the work as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials to be supplied by Contractor.
